item.description:
It looks like a number of our group are headed out to see The Decemberists on Friday night...come meet us for drinks/food at the Lansdowne Pub (right next to the HoB) before the show!

The House of Blues' ridiculous seating policy makes it difficult to meet at the venue (the floor, mezzanine and seated sections are all segregated, so it's impossible to keep a group together if people have tickets for different areas). So Marissa and the group will be meeting at the Lansdowne around 6, then heading over to the HoB around 7 when the doors open. She'll be in the mezzanine, so if you can't make it until after 7 and you happen to be there as well, call/text her when you arrive to find her and the group.
item.how_to_find_us: Call/text me when you arrive to find the group. I'll send out my number a few days before the show.
item.name: Pre-show meetup: The Decemberists w/ Wye Oak & Mountain Man @ House of Blues
